required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: P-POSSUM Score and Length of Stay
clinical_study.official_title: Correlation Between P-POSSUM Score and Length of Stay in Kidney Transplant Recipients

brief_summary.textblock: P-POSSUM score had a predictive power of >80% to predict the length of stay of kidney transplant recipients

primary_outcome.measure: Correlation between each variable of P-POSSUM and length of stay
primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day before surgery until discharged from hospital, up to 30 days
primary_outcome.description: Correlation between 18 variables (12 variables as physical parameters and 6 variables as operative parameters) and length of stay

primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day before surgery until discharged from hospital, up to 30 days
primary_outcome.description: P-POSSUM score ability to discriminate length of stay based on variable scores: physical parameters and operative parameters

primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day before surgery until discharged from hospital, up to 30 days
primary_outcome.description: P-POSSUM score cutoff to predict length of stay based on variable scores: physical parameters and operative parameters

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient's length of stay post kidney transplantation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From post surgery until discharged from hospital, up to 30 days
secondary_outcome.description: Patient's length of stay post kidney transplantation
The score for Age variable cut-off: point for <61 years point for 61-71 years 4 point >71 years

The score for heart disease variable cut-off: point for no heart failure point for diuretic, digoxin or angina/hypertension medicine usage 4 point for peripheral edema, warfarin, or borderline cardiomegaly on chest X-ray (CXR)

The score for lung disease variable cut-off: point for no dyspnea points for exertional dyspnea or mild COPD on CXR 4 points for limiting dyspnea or moderate COPD on CXR 8 points for dyspnea at rest or fibrosis/consolidation on CXR
The score for ECG abnormality variable cut-off: 1 point for normal ECG 4 points for atrial fibrillation (HR 60-90 8 points for 5 ectopic beats/min, Q waves or ST/T wave change

secondary_outcome.measure: P-POSSUM score (physical parameters): Systolic blood pressure
secondary_outcome.description: The score for systolic blood pressure variable cut-off: point for 110 - 130 mmHg points for 100-109 mmHg or 131-170 mmHg 4 points for > 170 mmHg or 90-99 mmHg 8 points for < 90 mmHg
The score for pulse rate variable cut-off: point for 50-80 beats per minute (bpm) points for 40-59 bpm or 81-100 bpm 4 points for 101-120 bpm 8 points for > 121 bpm or < 40 bpm
The score for hemoglobin variable cut-off: point for 13-16 g/dL points for 11.5-12.9 or 16.1-17 d/dL 4 points for 10-11.4 or 17.1-18 g/dL 8 points for <10 or >18 g/dL
The score for leukocyte count variable cut-off: point for 4.000-10.000/mm3 points for 10.100-20.000 atau 3.100-4.000/mm3 4 points for >20.000 atau <3.000/mm3

secondary_outcome.measure: P-POSSUM score (physical parameters): Plasma potassium concentration
secondary_outcome.description: The score for plasma potassium concentration variable cut-off: point for 3.5-5 mmol/L points for 3.2-3.4 or 5.1-5.3 mmol/L 4 points for 2.9-3.1 or 5.4-5.9 mmol/L 8 points for <2.9 or >5.9 mmol/L

secondary_outcome.measure: P-POSSUM score (physical parameters): Plasma sodium concentration
secondary_outcome.description: The score for plasma sodium concentration variable cut-off: point for >135 mmol/L points for 131-135 mmol/L 4 points for 126-130 mmol/L 8 points for <126 mmol/L

secondary_outcome.measure: P-POSSUM score (operative parameters): Number of procedures
secondary_outcome.description: The score for number of procedures variable cut-off: 1 point for one 4 points for two 8 points for more than two

secondary_outcome.measure: P-POSSUM score (operative parameters): Intraoperative blood loss
secondary_outcome.description: The score for intraoperative blood loss variable cut-off: point for <100 mL points for 101-500 mL 4 points for 501-999 mL 8 points for > 999 mL
The score for peritoneal contamination/soiling variable cut-off: point for none points for minor (serous fluid) 4 points for local pus 8 points for free bowel content, pus or blood

secondary_outcome.measure: P-POSSUM score (operative parameters): Presence of malignancy
secondary_outcome.description: The score for presence of malignancy variable cut-off: point for none points for primary only 4 points for nodal metastases 8 points for distant metastases

secondary_outcome.measure: P-POSSUM score (operative parameters): Mode of surgery
secondary_outcome.description: The score for mode of surgery variable cut-off: 1 point for elective 4 points for emergency resuscitation of > 2 hours possible operation < 24 hours after admission 8 points for emergency (immediate surgery < 2 hours needed)

arm_group.description: Living donor patients who had â‰¤ 6 days length of stay after laparoscopic nephrectomy procedure
Living donor patients who had > 6 days length of stay after laparoscopic nephrectomy procedure

intervention.intervention_name: Portsmouth Physiological and Operative Severity Score for the Enumeration of Mortality and Morbidity (P-POSSUM) score
intervention.description: P-POSSUM score's variables are divided into physiological parameters (age, cardiac, respiratory, ECG, systolic blood pressure, pulse rate, haemoglobin, leukocyte count, urea, sodium plasma, potassium plasma, and GCS) and operative parameters (operation type, number of procedures, operative blood loss, peritoneal contamination, malignancy status, CEPOD).

study_pop.textblock: Medical record of recipients who undewernt kidney transplant during a period between January 2015 and December 2017

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjects are medical record of recipients who underwent kidney transplant
Exclusion Criteria:
- Medical record was incomplete
- Patients who died during surgery or before the patient was discharged.

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Anesteshiology and Intensive Care, Cipto Mangunkusumo Hospital, Universitas Indonesia
